column2: but its meaning is hard to deduce with certainty. It may come from the roots linda fair
column3: -órë rising; or perhaps rië crown and -ië
column4: a suffix verb form used as an adjective; "Rising Beauty" or "High Crown of Fair Beauty" (i.e. golden-haired).

column1: *http://www.taibu.net/familytree Family-Tree of the Eldar and Atani
